hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOOC_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_STATUS, REC_VER, EOOC_SENDING_STATION, EOOC_ARRIVAL, EOOC_BILLING_METHOD, EOOC_FREIGHT, EOOC_PICK_UP_CHARGE, EOOC_DELIVERY_FEE, EOOC_TRANSFER_CHARGE, EOOC_HANDLING_FEE, EOOC_OTHER_CHARGE, EOOC_ORDER_ID FROM EO_ORDER_COSTS WHERE 1=1 <<AND EOOC_ID LIKE :eoocId>> <<AND CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<AND CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<AND REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<AND EOOC_SENDING_STATION LIKE :eoocSendingStation>> <<AND EOOC_ARRIVAL LIKE :eoocArrival>> <<AND EOOC_BILLING_METHOD LIKE :eoocBillingMethod>> <<AND EOOC_FREIGHT LIKE :eoocFreight>> <<AND EOOC_PICK_UP_CHARGE LIKE :eoocPickUpCharge>> <<AND EOOC_DELIVERY_FEE LIKE :eoocDeliveryFee>> <<AND EOOC_TRANSFER_CHARGE LIKE :eoocTransferCharge>> <<AND EOOC_HANDLING_FEE LIKE :eoocHandlingFee>> <<AND EOOC_OTHER_CHARGE LIKE :eoocOtherCharge>> <<AND EOOC_ORDER_ID LIKE :eoocOrderId>> ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
